system.description:
With an incantation and a sprinkling of flower oil, you summon brambles that resemble naga from the ground.

Spend 1 Beat to choose a tile in range 4. Then, create two line 4 dragon bramble fields from it. These fields are hindering terrain but are floral in nature. If they are ever burned, all enemies adjacent to it are set aflame.

Naga Corpseflowers: Spend 2 Beats. You can now create four line 4 dragon bramble fields from it.

Slithering Bakunawa Blossoms: Spend 3 Beats. Turn the Lines into Paths instead, and you can teleport into any tile adjacent to the field.
system.flavor: Flower Balyan are balyan, still. They are taught to practice and learn the ways of the spirits, to communicate with them, and to give extra reverence due to their own trespasses brought about by learning their Martial Art. Even as they create designs of grand dragon flowers.
